content: सनाभि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Connected by the same navel or womb, uterine. {@--2@} Kindred, related. {@--3@} Like, resembling; गंगावर्तसनाभिर्नाभिः <ls>Dk.</ls> {@--4@} Affectionate. --भिः {@--1@} A uterine brother; a near kinsman. {@--2@} A relation, kinsman; <ls>Ki. 13. 11.</ls> {@--3@} A relation as far as the seventh degree.
